snippet: News Outdoor Russia, which was sold in July, is being investigated by the Justice Department for allegations it paid off Russian officials.
abstract: News Outdoor Russia, which was sold in July, is being investigated by the Justice Department for allegations it paid off Russian officials.

headline.main: News Corp. Faces Inquiry of Ex-Arm for Bribery
headline.print_headline: News Corp. Faces Inquiry Of Subsidiary For Bribery
